experiments.name: Active Learner
experiments.head: Prototype
experiments.description: An interactive visualization of active learning data labeling strategies for supervised machine learning.

experiments.name: Handtrack.js
experiments.head: Library
experiments.description: Handtrack.js is a library for prototyping realtime hand detection (bounding box), directly in the browser.

experiments.name: UMAP Explorer
experiments.head: Demo
experiments.description: An interactive UMAP visualization of the MNIST data set.

experiments.name: Active Learning with Logistic Regression
experiments.head: Demo
experiments.description: A toy example about logistic regression and different active learning strategies.

experiments.name: Turbofan Tycoon
experiments.head: Prototype
experiments.description: See if you have what it takes to make it as a turbofan factory owner in our federated learning prototype.

experiments.name: Probabilistic Real Estate
experiments.head: Prototype
experiments.description: A probabilistic programming prototype that predicts future real estate prices across New York City boroughs and neighborhoods.

experiments.name: Brief Preview
experiments.head: Prototype
experiments.description: Brief uses neural networks to score and highlight the most interesting sentences within any article.

experiments.name: Using three.js for 2D Data Visualization
experiments.head: Tutorial
experiments.description: An interactive notebook about using three.js to render tens of thousands of points.

experiments.name: Encartopedia
experiments.head: Demo
experiments.description: Encartopedia visualizes Wikipedia topic clusters and plots your journey through them.

experiments.name: Visualizing the Taste of a Community of Cinephiles
experiments.head: Demo
experiments.description: An interactive visualization that uses T-SNE to cluster movies together based on user ratings.

experiments.name: Luhn Method Demo
experiments.head: Demo
experiments.description: Luhn's method, from 1958, provides a foundation for understanding modern auto-summarization techniques.
